hadiths.text: Narrated Grandfather of Talhah: I entered upon the Prophet (ﷺ) while he was performing ablution, and the water was running down his face and beard to his chest. I saw him rinsing his mouth and snuffing up water separately

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْفَرْقِ بَيْنَ الْمَضْمَضَةِ وَالاِسْتِنْشَاقِ
chapter.eng-name: Separating Between The Madmadah and Istinshaq
